section.p:
Ankh and Subverison has numerous features, options, but on a day-to-day basis, odds are that you will only use a few of them. In this section we'll run through the most common things that you might find yourself doing with Ankh in the course of a day's work.
The typical work cycle looks like this:
Update your working copy
svn update
Make changes
svn add
svn delete
svn move
svn copy
Examine your changes
svn status
svn diff
svn revert
Merge others' changes
svn merge
svn resolve
Commit your changes
svn commit
